LightningComponentBundle.description: Provides 2 buttons that sets output text (switcher) and requests a Next navigation.

property.name: buttonLabel1
property.label: Button Label(1)
property.description: Label that will appear on the button.

property.name: switcherValue1
property.label: Switcher Value(1)
property.description: Value that will be returned to the switcher variable if this button is clicked. Defaults to 'Next'.

property.name: isFinish1
property.label: Is Finish?(1)
property.description: If true, button sends a Finish instead of Next event.

property.name: switcher1
property.label: Path Switcher(1)
property.description: Defines the path the user selected, e.g. Canvas User Search, Next, etc.

property.name: buttonLabel2
property.label: Button Label(2)
property.description: Label that will appear on the button.

property.name: switcherValue2
property.label: Switcher Value(2)
property.description: Value that will be returned to the switcher variable if this button is clicked. Defaults to 'Next'.

property.name: isFinish2
property.label: Is Finish?(2)
property.description: If true, button sends a Finish instead of Next event.

property.name: switcher2
property.label: Path Switcher(2)
property.description: Defines the path the user selected, e.g. Canvas User Search, Next, etc.
